subject: PSYCH
title: Clinical Full-Time Fieldwork Placement I
description: This spring practicum offers 400 hours of training in assessment and/or treatment procedures in a clinical setting that are accrued by working 4 days per week. This practicum can be completed by working 4 days a week in one setting or splitting the 4 days across two settings. Clinical students would enrol for this course in the spring of their first, second or third year of the program. Prior to undertaking the placement, the student must submit to the Director of the Clinical Program a proposal that outlines the plans for the practicum (e.g., the nature and quantity of clinical work) and the arrangements for supervision. Only students in the Clinical Psychology program are permitted to take this course. Graded on a CR/NCR basis.
